attributes.action: Pull out of the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to it's political nature, I believe entering is a waste of time, money and effort due to tactical voting based upon other countries voting. If Wales, Ireland, Northern Ireland, Scotland and England entered, maybe we might get somewhere.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
